name: OPTIMADEStructure
description: A datamode for an OPTIMADE structures entry

dimensions.name: nelements
dimensions.description: Number of different elements in the structure as an integer

dimensions.name: nsites
dimensions.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

dimensions.name: nperiodic_dimensions
dimensions.description: An integer specifying the number of periodic dimensions in the structure, equivalent to the number of non-zero entries in dimension_types.

properties.name: id
properties.description: An entry's ID as defined in section Definition of Terms.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The name of the type of an entry.

properties.name: immutable_id
properties.description: The entry's immutable ID (e.g., an UUID).

properties.name: last_modified
properties.description: Date and time representing when the entry was last modified.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: The chemical symbols of the different elements present in the structure.

properties.name: element_ratios
properties.description: Relative proportions of different elements in the structure

properties.name: chemical_formula_descriptive
properties.description: The chemical formula for a structure as a string in a form chosen by the API implementation.

properties.name: chemical_formula_reduced
properties.description: The reduced chemical formula for a structure as a string with element symbols and integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

properties.name: chemical_formula_hill
properties.description: The chemical formula for a structure in Hill form with element symbols followed by integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1

properties.name: chemical_formula_anonymous
properties.description: The anonymous formula is the chemical_formula_reduced, but where the elements are instead first ordered by their chemical proportion number, and then, in order left to right, replaced by anonymous symbols A, B, C, ..., Z, Aa, Ba, ..., Za, Ab, Bb, ... and so on.

properties.name: dimension_types
properties.description: List of three integers. For each of the three directions indicated by the three lattice vectors (see property lattice_vectors), this list indicates if the direction is periodic (value 1) or non-periodic (value 0). Note: the elements in this list each refer to the direction of the corresponding entry in lattice_vectors and not the Cartesian x, y, z directions.

properties.name: lattice_vectors
properties.description: The three lattice vectors in Cartesian coordinates, in ångström (Å).

properties.name: cartesian_site_positions
properties.description: Cartesian positions of each site in the structure. A site is usually used to describe positions of atoms; what atoms can be encountered at a given site is conveyed by the species_at_sites property, and the species themselves are described in the species property.
